description:
An unexpected development catches Norn off guard. She needs another plan, but that assumes she can first survive Keyarga’s wrath.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Der Heiler und die neue Reise!
Kaifuku Jutsushi wa, Arata naru Tabi ni Deru!
The Healer Starts a New Journey!
回復術士は, 新たなる旅に出る!
